name: Integrate Gamma AI Core
desc: Consumes a Gamma AI core from your inventory and permanently integrates it into the ship as a built-in modification. The integration cannot be removed once installed.
short: Integrates a Gamma AI core from your inventory into the ship.

desc: Consumes a Beta AI core from your inventory and permanently integrates it into the ship as a built-in modification. The integration cannot be removed once installed.
short: Integrates a Beta AI core from your inventory into the ship.

desc: Consumes an Omega AI core from your inventory and permanently integrates it into the ship as a built-in modification. The integration cannot be removed once installed.
short: Integrates an Omega AI core from your inventory into the ship.

name: Integration Confirmed
desc: Confirms and completes the AI core integration process. Install this after selecting which AI core to integrate.

name: AI Integration (Gamma)
tags: special, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, relic, rare_bp, AIIntegration
desc: A relic of Tri-Tachyon's golden age of AI research. This ancient integration system connects a civilized AI directly into the ship's architecture. The AI addition grants perfect autofire accuracy, a small bonus to the ship's time dilation and peak performance time, and either reduces the rate at which Epta shield power decays or increases microshield capacity. Only grants reduced time dilation and PPT to non Epta ships. AI personas may also develop bonds with ship captains which increase their effects. Reduces ship flux capacity by 35 percent in main menu missions. This hullmod must be installed using the installation hullmod at a spaceport.

tags: special, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, relic, rare_bp, AIIntegration
desc: A relic of Tri-Tachyon's golden age of AI research. This ancient integration system connects a civilized AI directly into the ship's architecture. name: AI Integration (Alpha)
tags: special, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, relic, rare_bp, AIIntegration
desc: A relic of Tri-Tachyon's golden age of AI research. This ancient integration system connects a civilized AI directly into the ship's architecture. The AI addition grants perfect autofire accuracy, a small bonus to the ship's time dilation and peak performance time, and either reduces the rate at which Epta shield power decays or increases microshield capacity. name: AI Integration (Omega)
tags: special, no_build_in, no_drop, no_drop_salvage, relic, rare_bp, AIIntegration
desc: A relic of Tri-Tachyon's golden age of AI research. This ancient integration system connects an omega AI core directly into the ship's architecture. The omega core addition grants perfect autofire accuracy, a significant bonus to the ship's time dilation and peak performance time, and either reduces the rate at which Epta shield power decays or increases microshield capacity. Only grants reduced time dilation and PPT to non Epta ships. Omega cores are extremely rare and non-dropping in the base game. AI personas may also develop bonds with ship captains which increase their effects. Reduces ship flux capacity by 35 percent in main menu missions. This hullmod must be installed using the installation hullmod at a spaceport.

name: Advanced Virtual Combat Simulators
desc: A salvaged Tri-Tachyon relic from before the AI Wars. The pilot's mind is directly uploaded to a VR simulation with their AI partner which vastly improves design efficiency. Grants 350 ground support bonus, however, if an AI Integration is not installed then the simulators, and the ship's flux grid, cannot function.

name: AI Assisted Maintenance
desc: A relic of Tri-Tachyon's golden age. This ancient AI maintenance system uses advanced diagnostic algorithms to drastically reduce the amount of components that need regular replacements. The integrated next-generation flux grid optimization systems also drastically reduce the flux requirements of most fitted weapons. Unfortunately said flux grids are ill suited to powering lower tech weapons, reducing ballistic weapon range and flux cost reduction. Decreases maintenance costs by %s and decreases the flux cost to fire energy weapons by %s and ballistic weapons by %s. Decreases ballistic weapon range by %s.
sModDesc: Increases the maintenance reduction to %s, the energy weapon flux reduction to %s, and the ballistic weapon flux reduction to %s.

name: Advanced VR Training Sims
desc: Dozens of Full Dive VR Simulator Rigs are installed to allow marines to train without participating in actual combat. Daily usage of the simulators will improve marine effectiveness over time without any chance of casualties, but the flux requirements to run the simulators effectively reduces ship flux capacity by %s. Grants marine XP equal to %s of maximum crew capacity per day. Marine XP gained per day is limited to a daily maximum of %s of the marines currently in the fleet.

name: ER Targeting Device
desc: Installs new arrays of energy management, increasing the base range of energy weapons by %s. This happens by the concentration of heat output, maintaining a consistent projectile, that flies trought larger distances. The consequence of this, is the higher delay and cost to fire, reducing fire rate by %s, and flux cost by %s. This bonus have a threshould of %s. Incompatible with more sofisticated targeting units, such advanced ones, and supercomputers.

name: Automated Mothball
desc: An old Tri-Tachyon relic system. Mothballed ships normally require time to recover their combat readiness after their recommissioning. However, Tri-Tachyon engineers developed methods to mothball ships without this issue, resulting in %s by having a Delta + AI core assigned to maintain the ship. The vessel will be combat ready after mere minutes instead of days after the crew take over the ship's systems again. Unfortunately while the ship does not require crew for maintenance, the AI core is far less efficient than a human crew familiar with the ship, %s. Since the maintance duty continues, the supply cost remains the %s. Is inneficient on %s, since they already have an AI core.

name: Scatter Targeting Device
desc: Allows an augmented charging pattern with energy weapons which makes projectiles and/or beams have a greater concentration of power, increasing damage output by %s, without increasing flux generation. As a result the energy concentration dissipates faster than normal, reducing range by %s.

name: Polarized Shields
desc: While working on polarized armor, engineers tried applying this technology to shields, with surprising effects. While the hard flux of polarized shields increases, the flux capacity and dissipation are augmented and increased by up to %s. Unfortunately the high stress of flux caused by this effect necessitates the removal of structural components to rework the grid, resulting in a reduced structural resistance, having %s less hull and armor integrity.

name: Upgraded Shields
desc: A modification that serves as a support compatible with existing shield modifications. This compensates for underwhelming shield arcs by extending them by %s degrees, however the extra wide emitters slow down the shield unfolding and turning rate by %s
